featured.title: Dunki
featured.description: A heartwarming story of friendship, dreams, and the journey of a lifetime.
featured.synopsis: Dunki follows the journey of four friends who dream of settling abroad. They take an illegal route called 'Donkey Flight' to reach their destination. The film explores themes of friendship, dreams, and the lengths people go to achieve their aspirations. A heartwarming tale that combines comedy, drama, and emotion.

movies.title: Animal
movies.description: An intense action-packed drama that explores complex relationships.
movies.synopsis: A story about a man's complex relationship with his father and his journey of revenge.

movies.title: Salaar
movies.description: A gripping tale of power, loyalty, and redemption.
movies.synopsis: A gangster's promise to his dying friend leads him into a world of crime and violence.
